text: Amber Gurung () (February 26, 1938 - June 7, 2016) was a Nepali composer, singer and lyricist. He was popularly known as the music composer of Nepal's national anthem "Sayaun Thunga Phool Ka". Gurung died of esophageal cancer in Kathmandu, Nepal on June 7, 2016, aged 78. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Nepalese singers Category:20th-century composers Category:Nepalese writers
title: Amber Gurung
